SummonerPoroThrow.description: Throw a poro at a location, granting vision.

SummonerSmite.description: Deals 600-1200 true damage to target large monster.

SummonerFlash.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

SummonerHeal.description: Restores Health to your champion and an ally.

SummonerBarrier.description: Shields your champion from damage for a short duration.

SummonerGhost.description: Grants increased movement speed and allows you to move through units.

SummonerExhaust.description: Reduces a target enemy champion's movement speed and damage dealt.

SummonerTeleport.description: After channeling for a few seconds, teleports your champion to a target allied structure, minion, or ward.

SummonerIgnite.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing damage over time and reducing healing effects.

SummonerClarity.description: Restores Mana to your champion and nearby allies.

SummonerCleanse.description: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion.
